New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 49th ODI century, equaling Sachin Tendulkar's record
Key Match Events: South Africa were bowled out for 83 runs
Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his happiness on his birthday and equaling Tendulkar's record
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's chase began disastrously, losing half their side for 40 runs inside 14 overs
Others: Mohammed Shami took 2 wickets, Mohammed Siraj and Kuldeep Yadav also took wickets
Marco Jansen was the highest scorer for South Africa with 14 runs
